'''Flash of Glory''' is an exclusive [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It can be obtained by claiming Surprise Bundle 2 or 3 from the [https://twitter.com/GooglePlay/status/1549804394077736960 Google Play Gift Card Promotion]. Max amount obtainable is 3.{{Verify}}
